text: Anastasios "Tasos" Spyropoulos (; born April 1, 1995) is a Greek professional basketball player for Larisa of the Greek Basket League. He is a 2.08 m (6'10") tall power forward-center. ==Professional career== Spyropoulos began his pro career on 9 March, 2011, during the 2010–11 season,9 Μαρτίου 2011 06:00 | ΠΑΟΚ SPORTS ARENA . with the top division Greek Basket League club PAOK.Κανονική Περίοδος . He joined the first division Greek club Panionios in 2012. He then played with the Greek 2nd Division club Doukas, in the 2015–16 season. He moved to the Greek 2nd Division club GS Larissas, for the 2016–17 season. He joined the Greek 2nd Division club Holargos, for the 2017–18 season. ==National team career== With the junior national teams of Greece, Spyropoulos played at the 2011 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship, the 2013 FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship, and the 2015 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship.Anastasios SPYROPOULOS (GRE). ==References== ==External links== *EuroCup Profile *FIBA Archive Profile *FIBA Europe Profile *Eurobasket.com Profile *Greek Basket League Profile *Greek Basket League Profile Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Doukas B.C. players Category:Larisa B.C. players Category:Greek men's basketball players Category:Gymnastikos S.
